name: backend
description: **OperationsERP** is an educational project motivated by my code-related studies. The goal is to have a fully working application running on the web that allows you to manage your company along with **employee management, project/task management, work logs, invoice system and audit logs**. This project was made with the goal of polishing my server-sided skills as well and finish my first project with a user-died interface.

scripts.dev: prisma migrate reset --force && prisma generate && prisma db seed && tsx watch src/server.ts
scripts.test: prisma migrate reset --force && prisma db seed && jest --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
